title: 202511.WSI - Income Inequality and Political Participation in Germany: Insights from the WSI-Verteilungsbericht 2025
description: This episode explores the rising income inequality in Germany and its implications for democracy, based on the WSI-Verteilungsbericht 2025. We discuss recent trends, their impact on political trust and voting behavior, and policy recommendations to foster a more inclusive society and strengthen democratic participation..
